CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, page 21, reads: "Yardstick booth passed out yardsticks and swatches of their summer patterns. Posed before a colorful background are Herman Gottlief, Mae Saewitz, Rosalind Saewitz, Monrette Davis and Ethel Mike. Back Row: Sidney Gottlief, George Stevenson and Samuel Saewitz."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait from left, front row: Herman Gottlief, Mae Saewitz, Rosalind Saewitz, Monrette Davis, and Ethel Mike; back row: Sidney Gottlief, George Stevenson, and Samuel Saewitz, gathered at "The Yardstick" display booth in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
